short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and fun game where Just a Chill Guy dodge falling objects. Use arrow keys to move and 'P' to pause.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take a break and have some fun with "Just a Chill Guy Game"! In this simple, yet addictive game, you'll control a chill guy who must dodge falling objects to stay alive. Use the left and right arrow keys to move and avoid getting hit. The game offers a pause function by pressing the "P" key whenever you need a quick breather.

Features:

Fun and Casual Gameplay: Test your reflexes as you dodge falling objects.
Score Tracking: Keep an eye on your current score and aim for a new high score.
Real-time Coin Price: Stay updated with the current price of the CHILLGUY cryptocurrency directly in the game.
Local High Score: Compete with yourself by setting new top scores stored in your browser.
Game Pause/Resume: Pause the game whenever you need to take a break.
It's the perfect way to unwind and have some light-hearted fun in between tasks! Try it now and see how long you can survive!
